statements: DELETE FROM customer_consent_data WHERE id = 1 AND consent_given = TRUE
DELETE FROM customer_consent_data WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND consent_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM customer_consent_data WHERE consent_given = FALSE
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Alice Johnson' AND email = 'alice@example.com';
DELETE FROM consent_logs WHERE consent_type = 'Marketing' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE consent_given = FALSE);
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123 AND email = 'example@email.com';
DELETE FROM consent_logs WHERE customer_id = 456 AND DATE(consent_date) < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM consent_preferences WHERE preference_type = 'Marketing' AND preference_value = 'Yes';
DELETE FROM customer_consent WHERE customer_id = 1 AND consent_type_id = 3;
DELETE FROM customer_consent WHERE customer_id = 1 AND consent_type_id = 2;
DELETE FROM consent_log WHERE customer_id = 3 AND action = 'delete';
DELETE FROM customer_consent WHERE customer_id = 1 AND consent_type_id = 1;
DELETE FROM customer_consent WHERE customer_id = 1002 AND consent_type_id = 2001;
